definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: need, thing needed, poverty;—´[[מ]] abs. Pr 11:24 + 6 t.; cstr. Ju Jdg 18:10, Jdg 19:19; sf. [[מַחְסוֹרְךָ]] Ju Jdg 19:20; [[מַחְסרְךָ]] Pr 6:11; [[מַחְסׂרוֹ]] De 15:8; pl. sf. [[מַחְסׂרֶיךָ]] Pr 24:34; —
need = thing needed [[דֵּי מַחְסׂרוֹ]] De 15:8 enough for his need (sq. [[אשׁר יֶחְסַר לוֹ]], cf. [[חָסֵר]] vb.); [[עָלָָי]] ´[[כָּל־מ]] Ju Jdg 19:20 all thy need be upon me (for me to provide).
lack, want [[כָּל־דָּבָר]] ´[[אֵין מ]] Ju Jdg 18:10 no lack of anything, Jdg 19:19, Ps 34:10.
